user_action_and_explanation: type 'Mount Kilimanjaro elevation' into the search bar with the placeholder text 'Search' to find the elevation of Mount Kilimanjaro.
observation: The search query was successfully executed and the elevation of Mount Kilimanjaro is displayed prominently at the top of the Google search results. The elevation is 19,341 feet (5,895 meters) above sea level.
